text:
Is there a way to hide the "don't use style tags warning" in the drag and drop email editor? I think this use is valid:
```<style type="text/css" 
  data-hse-inline-css="true">```
or is there some other way of inlining that CSS? (in the drag and drop editor)
can I load it as a "linked file" maybe? would it be an html file with a `<style>` tag?
